title: User Registration with Valid Data
description: Verify that a new user can successfully register with valid data including email, password, and profile information.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input valid email, password, and required profile details
Submit registration form
Confirm registration success message is shown
Verify user account is created in backend database

title: User Registration with Invalid Email Format
description: Check that registration fails when an invalid email format is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to registration page
Input invalid email format and valid password/profile
Submit registration form
Error message for invalid email format is displayed
User account is not created

title: User Login with Correct Credentials
description: Verify that an existing user can log in with correct email and password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid registered email and correct password
Click login button
User is authenticated and redirected to dashboard or homepage
JWT token is issued and stored securely

title: User Login with Incorrect Password
description: Verify login failure when using incorrect password.

steps.description: Navigate to login page
Input valid email and incorrect password
Click login button
Login failure message is displayed
No authentication token is issued

title: View Product Catalog and Use Filtering
description: Validate users can browse the product catalog and apply filtering options to refine product list.

steps.description: Navigate to product catalog page
Apply filters such as product type (pineapple, derivatives), price range, and availability
Filtered products match selected criteria
Filtering does not break page layout or cause errors

title: View Detailed Product Information
description: Check that product details page displays correct information including nutritional facts and images.

steps.description: From product catalog, select a product
Product name, detailed nutritional info, images, and price are displayed
Images load correctly

title: Add Product to Shopping Cart and Persist Cart
description: Verify that adding products to the cart updates cart correctly and persists after page refresh or login state change.

steps.description: Add product to cart from product detail page
Product appears in shopping cart with correct quantity and price
Refresh the page or log out and log in again
Shopping cart contents persist and are accurate

title: Apply Valid Discount Coupon at Checkout
description: Test that applying a valid discount coupon updates the cart total appropriately and checkout proceeds.

steps.description: Add eligible products to shopping cart
Apply a valid discount coupon code
Discount is applied to order total
Proceed with checkout through delivery and payment steps
Order is successfully placed with updated total

title: Apply Invalid Discount Coupon
description: Check system behavior when an invalid or expired coupon code is applied.

steps.description: Add products to shopping cart
Apply an invalid or expired coupon code
An error message informs user coupon is invalid or expired
Order total remains unchanged

title: Complete Multi-step Checkout with Mobile Wallet Payment
description: Verify successful order placement through the multi-step checkout selecting mobile wallet as payment method.

steps.description: Add products to cart
Proceed to checkout
Enter valid delivery address and preferences
Select mobile wallet payment option
Confirm order
Order is recorded and confirmation is sent
Payment is processed successfully

title: Complete Multi-step Checkout with Cash on Delivery
description: Validate checkout flow with cash on delivery selected and order created successfully.

steps.description: Add products to cart and proceed to checkout
Enter delivery address and preferences
Select cash on delivery payment method
Confirm order placement
Order is created with COD payment status
User receives order confirmation notification

title: Setup New Subscription Plan with Customization
description: Verify users can create a subscription plan selecting delivery frequency and fruit preferences.

steps.description: Navigate to subscription plans page
Select a subscription plan for recurring fruit delivery
Customize fruit types, quantities, and delivery frequency
Confirm and save subscription
Subscription is created and reflected in user subscription dashboard

title: Modify Existing Subscription Plan
description: Validate that users can update their existing subscriptions including pause, change selections, and resume.

steps.description: Navigate to user subscription dashboard
Select an active subscription to modify
Change delivery frequency and fruit preferences
Pause and then resume the subscription
Changes and pause/resume actions are saved correctly
Billing and notifications are updated accordingly

title: Cancel Subscription Plan
description: Ensure users can cancel active subscriptions and receive cancellation confirmation.

steps.description: Access subscription management page
Select subscription to cancel
Confirm cancellation
Subscription is marked as canceled and ceases scheduled deliveries
User receives cancellation notification

title: Browse Farmers Directory and View Profile on Map
description: Test that the interactive map loads correctly with farmer profiles and details accessible.

steps.description: Navigate to Farmers Directory page
Leaflet map is rendered with markers for farmers
Click on a farmer marker
Farmer profile details are displayed including location, products, and contacts

title: Order Tracking with Real-time Updates and Notifications
description: Verify that after order placement, users receive real-time status updates and notifications via supported channels.

steps.description: Place a new order
Check order tracking page for real-time status updates
Order status updates dynamically at each delivery stage
User receives notifications via email, SMS, or WhatsApp as configured

title: Admin Login and Role-Based Access Control
description: Test successful admin login and verify that role-based permissions restrict access accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to admin dashboard login page
Enter valid admin credentials
Login and access admin dashboard
Access granted based on assigned roles
Restricted sections are inaccessible if role lacks permission

title: Admin Manage Product Inventory
description: Verify that admin can add, edit, and remove products including inventory quantity adjustments.

steps.description: Login to admin dashboard
Navigate to product management section
Add new product with complete details
Edit existing product's inventory quantities
Delete a product
All changes reflect correctly in the product catalog

title: Admin Content Management - Publish Blog and Banners
description: Check that admins can create, edit, and publish blog posts and banners on the platform.

steps.description: Open content management section in admin dashboard
Create a new blog post with title, body, and images
Edit existing blog post
Create and schedule banner advertisements
Blogs and banners appear correctly on public facing site

title: Educational Content Accessibility Verification
description: Validate that educational blog posts and recipe guides comply with WCAG 2.1 AA standards for accessibility.

steps.description: Navigate to educational content pages
Content is accessible via keyboard navigation and screen readers
Contrast ratios and font sizes meet WCAG 2.1 AA standards
Images and media have alternative text descriptions

title: User Profile Management - Update Address and Preferences
description: Verify users can update their profile information including addresses and product preferences.

steps.description: Log in and navigate to profile management page
Edit delivery address and save changes
Update fruit preferences or subscription settings
Updated information is saved and displayed correctly

title: Performance Test for Product Catalog Loading
description: Measure frontend performance to ensure Largest Contentful Paint is under 2.5 seconds on desktop and mobile.

steps.description: Load product catalog page on desktop environment
Largest Contentful Paint is under 2.5 seconds
Load product catalog page on mobile device or emulator
Largest Contentful Paint is under 2.5 seconds

title: Security Test: Rate Limiting on Login Endpoint
description: Verify the backend enforces rate limiting on login attempts to prevent brute force attacks.

steps.description: Send a high volume of invalid login requests in short period
Further login attempts are blocked or slowed with appropriate error

title: Security Test: GDPR Data Deletion Request
description: Confirm system handles GDPR user data deletion requests correctly and removes data as required.

steps.description: Submit a user data deletion request through profile settings
User personal data is deleted or anonymized in the system
Appropriate confirmation is sent to user
